headline: Is Allegion Public Limited Co. (ALLE) an Undervalued Stock?
summary: Fiduciary Management Inc. (FMI), an independent money management firm, released its first-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. US stock markets experienced a decline in Q1 due to changing trade policies and skepticism about AI, with the S&P 500 Index and Russell 2000 Index falling 4.27% and 9.48%, respectively. Consumer […]
